turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. I've been trying to call for two days and keep getting put on hold!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can help with that. To schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, could you please provide your name, date of birth, and insurance information?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my name is Jane Doe, my date of birth is January 1, 1980, and my insurance is Blue Cross Blue Shield, member ID is 123456789. What's her next available appointment?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. Let me check Dr. Ramirez's availability. It looks like she has an opening on October 27th at 2:00 PM. Would that time work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: October 27th at 2 PM works, but what kind of appointment is it? Is it telehealth or in-person? Because frankly, I need to be seen in person for this issue.
